entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 10:50 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: W 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
